sharingOwnerRules.description: This rule shares Mass Update Headers created by Master Data/Planning User to all Master Data/Planning Users
sharingOwnerRules.label: Mass Update MD to MD Sharing

sharingOwnerRules.description: This rule shares Mass Update Headers created by Master Data/Planning User to all Third Party Users.
sharingOwnerRules.label: Mass Update MD to TP Sharing

sharingOwnerRules.description: This rule shares Mass Update Headers created by Third Party User to all Master Data/Planning Users
sharingOwnerRules.label: Mass Update TP to MD Sharing

sharingOwnerRules.description: This rule shares Mass Update Headers created by Third Party User to all Third Party Users
sharingOwnerRules.label: Mass Update TP to TP Sharing
